info.title: Tarana Wireless Service Availability API
info.description:
Uses AI/ML to provide improved path loss and data rate predictions given ground truth from all existing Tarana links.

## Predict

You can post a **Sector** with a list of RNs to predict path loss & speed for, along with an optional list of RN heights, and an optional single BN (or the best BN will be determined from TCS).

You can post a **MultiSector** with a list of RNs to predict path loss & speed for, along with an optional list of RN heights, and an optional BN list used in addition to BNs in TCS for predictions.

Returns either **SectorOutput** with predicted path loss & speed, along with a profile picture, for all RNs, or

Returns **MultiSectorOutput** with multiple sectors, each with a BN and multiple RNs with predicted path loss & speed, along with a profile picture, for all RNs

You can post a **ReportRequest** with an optional number of days.

Returns **ReportOutput** with a combined .csv file containing information on all predictions performed in the last number of days (default of 7).

## Predict CSV

You can post a **.csv file of RNs** to predict path loss & speed for, along with an optional **.csv file of RN heights**, and an optional **.csv file of BNs** used in addition to BNs in TCS for predictions.

Returns **MultiSectorOutput** with multiple sectors, each with a BN and multiple RNs with predicted path loss & speed, along with a profile picture, for all RNs

## Heatmap

You can post a **HeatMap** with an optional list of heights, and a single BN.

You can post a **MultiHeatMap** with an optional list of heights, and a list of BNs to be used for heatmap creation.

Returns either **HeatMapOutput** with created heatmaps for a BN, or

Returns **MultiHeatmapOutput** with multiple sectors, each with a BN and created heatmaps

## Heatmap CSV

You can post a **.csv file of BNs** to create heatmaps for, along with an optional **.csv file of heights**

Returns **MultiHeatMapOutput** with multiple sectors, each with a BN with created heatmaps

## Health

You can test whether an API key is working or not.  Returns the name of the operator associated with the key.

post.description:
Find BNs with TCS Data Issues.
This endpoint retrieves a list of Base Nodes (BNs) for a given operator that have TCS data
issues: missing coordinates or frequency and/or incorrect height or tilt.


Args               Type                    Description                                                 Required
response_format    str                     The format of the response: 'csv' or 'json'                 Required
operator           Optional[str]           The operator name


Returns            Type                    Description
operator           str                     The operator name
bn_list            BNListOutput            An output object containing the list of BNs within the specified rectangular area

get.description:
Prediction Report API.
This endpoint reports on all predictions (single and multi-sector) made over the past number of
days specified (default = 7 days). An aggregated CSV file, containing the CSV portion of all the
predictions made, is returned, ordered newest to oldest.


Args               Type                    Description                                                 Required
days               Optional[int]           The report timeframe in days (default = 7)
download           Optional[bool]          Set true for a download URL instead of a direct response


Returns            Type                    Description
csv                str                     The aggregated CSV output of all predictions

parameters.name: download

schema.description: Set to true to get a download URL instead of a direct response
schema.title: Download

parameters.description: Set to true to get a download URL instead of a direct response

post.description:
Single Sector Prediction API.
This endpoint predicts the path loss and speed for a single sector, which consists of one Base
Node (BN) and one or more Remote Nodes (RNs). It takes the Sector object containing information
about the BN and RNs as input and returns an output object containing the predicted path loss,
speed, and other relevant information for the sector.


Args               Type                    Description                                                 Required
email              Optional[str]           The email address of the requestor
rn_list            List[RN]                The list of remote nodes (limit 100)                        Required
rn_heights         Optional[List[Height]]  The list of heights to use for predictions
bn                 Optional[BN]            The base node (used instead of TCS lookup)
cdf_graphs         bool                    Set true for path loss and link speed probability graphs    Required


Returns            Type                    Description
operator           str                     The operator name
email              str                     The email address of the requestor
csv                str                     The CSV representation of the sector output
bn                 BN                      The base node
rn_list            List[RNOutput]          The list of remote node outputs

parameters.name: cdf_graphs

schema.description: Create path loss and link speed probability graphs
schema.title: Cdf Graphs

parameters.description: Create path loss and link speed probability graphs

post.description:
Submit a Single Sector Prediction Job.
This endpoint submits a job to predict the path loss and speed for a sector in the background.
It returns immediately with the request ID that can be used to query the status of the prediction.


Args               Type                    Description                                                 Required
email              Optional[str]           The email address of the requestor
rn_list            List[RN]                The list of remote nodes (limit 100)                        Required
rn_heights         Optional[List[Height]]  The list of heights to use for predictions
bn                 Optional[BN]            The base node (used instead of TCS lookup)
cdf_graphs         bool                    Set true for path loss and link speed probability graphs    Required


Returns            Type                    Description
operator           str                     The operator who submitted the prediction job
request_id         str                     The unique identifier for the prediction request
message            str                     A message indicating the status of the submission

parameters.name: cdf_graphs

schema.description: Create path loss and link speed probability graphs
schema.title: Cdf Graphs

parameters.description: Create path loss and link speed probability graphs

get.description:
Get Status for a Single Sector Prediction Job.
This endpoint returns the prediction status, including the progress of prediction for Base Nodes (BNs)
and Remote Nodes (RNs), as well as the overall progress for all devices combined.


Args               Type                    Description                                                 Required
request_id         str                     The unique identifier for the prediction request            Required


Returns            Type                    Description
prediction_state   str                     The prediction state: executing or completed
all                PredictionProgress      The prediction progress for all devices combined
rns                PredictionProgress      The prediction progress for RNs
bns                PredictionProgress      The prediction progress for BNs

Get Results for a Single Sector Prediction Job.
This endpoint returns the prediction results, providing an output object containing
the predicted path loss, speed, and other relevant information for the sector.


Args               Type                    Description                                                 Required
request_id         str                     The unique identifier for the prediction request            Required
download           bool                    Set true for a download URL instead of a direct response


Returns            Type                    Description
operator           str                     The operator name
email              str                     The email address of the requestor
csv                str                     The CSV representation of the sector output
bn                 BN                      The base node
rn_list            List[RNOutput]          The list of remote node outputs
OR
Returns            Type                    Description
operator           str                     The name of the operator
request_id         str                     The unique identifier for the prediction request
json_response_url  str                     The URL where the JSON prediction results can be downloaded
csv_response_url   str                     The URL where the CSV  prediction results can be downloaded

parameters.name: download

schema.description: Set to true to get a download URL instead of a direct response
schema.title: Download

parameters.description: Set to true to get a download URL instead of a direct response

schema.title: Response Predict Sector Result V0 Predict Sector Result  Request Id  Get

post.description:
Multi-Sector Prediction API.
This endpoint predicts the path loss and speed for multiple sectors, each consisting of one
Base Node (BN) and one or more Remote Nodes (RNs). It takes the MultiSector object containing
information about the BNs, RNs, and optional additional BNs as input and returns an output
object containing the predicted path loss, speed, and other relevant information for each sector.


Args               Type                    Description                                                 Required
email              Optional[str]           The email address of the requestor
rn_list            List[RN]                The list of remote nodes (limit 100)                        Required
rn_heights         Optional[List[Height]]  The list of heights to use for predictions
bn_list            Optional[List[BN]]      The list of base nodes (used in addition to TCS lookup)
cdf_graphs         bool                    Set true for path loss and link speed probability graphs    Required


Returns            Type                    Description
operator           str                     The operator name
email              str                     The email address of the requestor
csv                str                     The CSV representation of the sector outputs
sector_list        List[SectorOutput]      The list of sector outputs

schema.description: Create path loss and link speed probability graphs
schema.title: Cdf Graphs

post.description:
Single Sector CSV Prediction API.
This endpoint predicts the path loss and speed for a single sector, which consists of one Base
Node (BN) and one or more Remote Nodes (RNs). It takes the multiple .csv files containing
information about the BN and RNs as input and returns an output object containing the predicted
path loss, speed, and other relevant information for the sector.


Args               Type                    Description                                                 Required
email              Optional[str]           The email address of the requestor
rn_csv_file        UploadFile              The CSV file with information on the RNs (limit 100)        Required
height_csv_file    Optional[UploadFile]    The CSV file with information on the heights of the RNs
bn_csv_file        Optional[UploadFile]    The CSV file with information on additional BNs to use
response_format    str                     The format of the response: 'csv' or 'json'                 Required
cdf_graphs         bool                    Set true for path loss and link speed probability graphs    Required


Returns            Type                    Description
operator           str                     The operator name
email              str                     The email address of the requestor
csv                str                     The CSV representation of the sector output
bn                 BN                      The base node
rn_list            List[RNOutput]          The list of remote node outputs

post.description:
Multi-Sector CSV Prediction API.
This endpoint predicts the path loss and speed for multiple sectors, each consisting of one
Base Node (BN) and one or more Remote Nodes (RNs). It takes multiple CSV files containing
information about the BNs, RNs, and optional additional BNs as input and returns an output
object containing the predicted path loss, speed, and other relevant information for each sector.


Args               Type                    Description                                                 Required
email              Optional[str]           The email address of the requestor
rn_csv_file        UploadFile              The CSV file with information on the RNs (limit 100)        Required
height_csv_file    Optional[UploadFile]    The CSV file with information on the heights of the RNs
bn_csv_file        Optional[UploadFile]    The CSV file with information on additional BNs to use
response_format    str                     The format of the response: 'csv' or 'json'                 Required
cdf_graphs         bool                    Set true for path loss and link speed probability graphs    Required


Returns            Type                    Description
operator           str                     The operator name
email              str                     The email address of the requestor
csv                str                     The CSV representation of the sector outputs
sector_list        List[SectorOutput]      The list of sector outputs

get.description:
**Secure Endpoint that Requires an API Key for Authorization.**
This endpoint returns a message confirming the authorization status of the provided API key. **Args:**
operator (str): The name of the operator authorized by the API key. This is determined by the `verify_api_key` function. **Returns:**
Dict[str, str]: A dictionary containing a message that confirms the operator authorized by the provided API key.

**Defines a simple root entry point for accessing the API documentation.**
This asynchronous function provides a basic root entry point for the API, ensuring that users receive instructions on how to access the API documentation. It returns a string containing the application name and instructions to append "/docs" to the URL to view the API definition. **Returns:**
str: A string containing the application name and instructions to access the API documentation.

AIMLOutput.title: AIMLOutput
AIMLOutput.description:
Represents the output of an AI/ML model


Attribute            Type                    Description
path_loss              Distribution            The path loss distribution, given that the link closes
link_speed             Distribution            The link speed distribution, given that the link closes
link_close_confidence  float                   The model's confidence that the link will close

AIMLOutputURL.title: AIMLOutputURL
AIMLOutputURL.description:
Represents AIML prediction URLs


Attribute          Type                    Description
path_loss              str                 Path Loss  heatmap URL
link_speed             str                 Link Speed heatmap URL
link_close_confidence  str                 Link Close heatmap URL

height_gps.title: Height Gps
height_gps.description: Units: meters (height above mean sea level, from GPS, information only)

ground_msl.title: Ground Msl
ground_msl.description: Units: meters (ground level, above mean sea level, information only)

BN.title: BN
BN.description:
Represents a Base Node (BN)
Used on output to supply information about BNs used for predictions


Attribute          Type                        Description                                              Required
operator           Optional[str]               The operator name
region             Optional[str]               The region   name
market             Optional[str]               The market   name
site               Optional[str]               The site     name
cell               Optional[str]               The cell     name
sector             Optional[str]               The sector   name
hostname           Optional[str]               The network  hostname
serial             Optional[str]               The BN serial number
latitude           Optional[float]             The latitude  in degrees
longitude          Optional[float]             The longitude in degrees
height_agl         Optional[float]             The height above ground level in meters
azimuth            Optional[float]             The azimuth  angle in degrees from north
downtilt           Optional[float]             The downtilt angle in degrees from level
carrier            Optional[List[Carrier]]     The list of carriers
network_profile    Optional[int]               The network profile: 1, 2, 5, or 6 (default: 1)
height_gps         Optional[float]             The height above mean sea level in meters (from GPS)
ground_msl         Optional[float]             The ground level above mean sea level in meters
sector_cnt         Optional[int]               The count of sectors on the tower
subscribers        Optional[int]               The number of subscribers
firmware           Optional[str]               The firmware version
timestamp          Optional[str]               The timestamp data was last collected
data_issues        Optional[str]               The set of data issues (if any) for this BN
heatmap_list       Optional[List[HeatMapInfo]] The set of heatmaps URLs for this BNs

BNInput.title: BNInput
BNInput.description:
Represents a Base Node (BN)
Used on input to supply information for prospective new BNs not yet in TCS


Attribute          Type                     Description                                                 Required
region             Optional[str]            The region  name
market             Optional[str]            The market  name
site               Optional[str]            The site    name
cell               Optional[str]            The cell    name
sector             Optional[str]            The sector  name
hostname           Optional[str]            The network hostname
serial             Optional[str]            The BN serial number                                        Serial number      OR
latitude           Optional[float]          The latitude  in degrees                                    Latitude          AND
longitude          Optional[float]          The longitude in degrees                                    Longitude         AND
height_agl         Optional[float]          The height above ground level in meters                     Height AGL        AND
azimuth            Optional[float]          The azimuth  angle in degrees from north                    Azimuth           AND
downtilt           Optional[float]          The downtilt angle in degrees from level                    Downtilt          AND
carrier            Optional[List[Carrier]]  The list of carriers                                        Carriers are required
network_profile    Optional[int]            The network profile: 1, 2, 5, or 6 (default: 1)

Carrier.title: Carrier
Carrier.description:
Represents a carrier


Attribute          Type                    Description                                                 Required
frequency          int                     The frequency in MHz                                        Required
bandwidth          Optional[int]           The bandwidth in MHz
tx_power           Optional[int]           The transmission power in dB

Distribution.title: Distribution
Distribution.description:
Represents a probability distribution


Attribute          Type                    Description
average            float                   The average value
std_dev            float                   The standard deviation value
percent            List[int]               The list of percentages
values             List[int]               The list of corresponding values
cdf_url            str                     The CDF SVG GCS bucket URL

GNPErrors.title: GNPErrors
GNPErrors.description:
Represents GNP calculation errors


Attribute          Type                    Description
free_space         str                     Free space     calculation error message
fixed_wireless     str                     Fixed wireless calculation error message
mobility_macro     str                     Mobility macro calculation error message
mobility_micro     str                     Mobility micro calculation error message

GNPOutputURL.title: GNPOutputURL
GNPOutputURL.description:
Represents GNP heatmap URLs


Attribute          Type                    Description
free_space         str                     Free space        heatmap URL
fixed_wireless     str                     Fixed wireless    heatmap URL
mobility_macro     str                     Mobility macro    heatmap URL
mobility_micro     str                     Mobility micro    heatmap URL
fresnel_clearance  str                     Fresnel clearance heatmap URL

GNPPathLoss.title: GNPPathLoss
GNPPathLoss.description:
Represents GNP path loss configuration


Attribute         Type                    Description
free_space         float                   Free space     path loss value
fixed_wireless     float                   Fixed wireless path loss value
mobility_macro     float                   Mobility macro path loss value
mobility_micro     float                   Mobility micro path loss value

HeatMapInfo.title: HeatMapInfo
HeatMapInfo.description:
Represents all heatmap prediction information


Attribute          Type                    Description
height                 Height              The height used for the heatmap generation
base_url               str                 The common URL prefix for heatmaps at this height
geotiff                HeatmapURLs         The set of URLs for the heatmap GeoTIFFs
kmz                    HeatmapURLs         The set of URLs for the heatmap KMZ files
kml                    HeatmapURLs         The set of URLs for the heatmap KML files
overlay                HeatmapURLs         The set of URLs for the heatmap overlay PNG files
legend                 HeatmapURLs         The set of URLs for the heatmap legend  PNG files

HeatMapLegends.title: HeatMapLegends
HeatMapLegends.description:
Represents heatmap prediction legends


Attribute          Type                    Description
base_url               str                 The URL common to all legends
confidence             str                 The URL for the confidence            legend
fresnel_clearance      str                 The URL for the fresnel clearance     legend
path_loss_3ghz         str                 The URL for the 3   GHz path loss     legend
path_loss_5ghz         str                 The URL for the 5/6 GHz path loss     legend
linkspeed_x2           str                 The URL for the 6 GHz   x2 link speed legend
linkspeed_3ghz         str                 The URL for the 3 GHz   x1 link speed legend
linkspeed_5ghz         str                 The URL for the 5/6 GHz x1 link speed legend

HeatMapURLs.title: HeatMapURLs
HeatMapURLs.description:
Represents all heatmap prediction URLs


Attribute          Type                    Description
gnp_output             GNPOutputURL        GNP   Heatmap Output URLs
aiml_output            AIMLOutputURL       AI/ML Heatmap Output URLs

above_open.title: Above Open
above_open.description: Units: meters (above ground when not building mounted, required)

above_roof.title: Above Roof
above_roof.description: Units: meters (above structure  when building mounted, required)

Height.title: Height
Height.description:
Represents the heights at which an RN is installed


Attribute          Type                    Description                                                 Required
above_open         float                   The height in meters above ground when not building mounted Required
above_roof         float                   The height in meters above building when building mounted   Required

location.title: Location
location.description: Enum: above open or above building

Mount.title: Mount
Mount.description:
Represents the manner in which an RN is installed


Attribute          Type                    Description
location           str                     The location the RN was mounted: above open or above building
height_agl         float                   The height in meters above the ground where mounted

MultiSector.title: MultiSector
MultiSector.description:
Represents multiple sectors for pathloss predictions
Used on input to supply information for a multi-sector (multiple BN) pathloss prediction


Attribute          Type                    Description                                                 Required
email              Optional[str]           The email address of the requestor
rn_list            List[RN]                The list of remote nodes                                    Required
rn_heights         Optional[List[Height]]  The list of heights to use for predictions
bn_list            Optional[List[BN]]      The list of base nodes (used in addition to TCS lookup)

rn_csv_file.title: Rn Csv File
rn_csv_file.description:
Required RNs .csv file for prediction
Required columns: rn.address     or  rn.latitude       and  rn.longitude
Optional columns: rn.subscriber      rn.heights.above_open  rn.heights.above_roof   rn.bn_serial

height_csv_file.title: Height Csv File
height_csv_file.description:
Optional RN heights .csv file for prediction
Required columns: height.above_open  height.above_roof

bn_csv_file.title: Bn Csv File
bn_csv_file.description:
Optional additional BNs .csv file for prediction
Required columns:
bn.serial (unique id)   bn.latitude             bn.longitude            bn.height_agl
bn.azimuth              bn.downtilt             bn.carrier.0.frequency  bn.carrier.1.frequency
Optional columns:
bn.operator             bn.region               bn.market               bn.site
bn.cell                 bn.sector               bn.hostname             bn.network_profile
bn.carrier.0.bandwidth  bn.carrier.0.tx_power   bn.carrier.2.frequency  bn.carrier.2.bandwidth  bn.carrier.2.tx_power
bn.carrier.1.bandwidth  bn.carrier.1.tx_power   bn.carrier.3.frequency  bn.carrier.3.bandwidth  bn.carrier.3.tx_power

rn_csv_file.title: Rn Csv File
rn_csv_file.description:
Required RNs .csv file for prediction
Required columns: rn.address     or  rn.latitude       and  rn.longitude
Optional columns: rn.subscriber      rn.heights.above_open  rn.heights.above_roof   rn.bn_serial

height_csv_file.title: Height Csv File
height_csv_file.description:
Optional RN heights .csv file for prediction
Required columns: height.above_open  height.above_roof

bn_csv_file.title: Bn Csv File
bn_csv_file.description:
Optional additional BNs .csv file for prediction
Required columns:
bn.serial (unique id)   bn.latitude             bn.longitude            bn.height_agl
bn.azimuth              bn.downtilt             bn.carrier.0.frequency  bn.carrier.1.frequency
Optional columns:
bn.operator             bn.region               bn.market               bn.site
bn.cell                 bn.sector               bn.hostname             bn.network_profile
bn.carrier.0.bandwidth  bn.carrier.0.tx_power   bn.carrier.2.frequency  bn.carrier.2.bandwidth  bn.carrier.2.tx_power
bn.carrier.1.bandwidth  bn.carrier.1.tx_power   bn.carrier.3.frequency  bn.carrier.3.bandwidth  bn.carrier.3.tx_power

MultiSectorOutput.title: MultiSectorOutput
MultiSectorOutput.description:
Represents the output of a multi-sector pathloss prediction


Attribute          Type                    Description
operator           str                     The operator name
email              str                     The email address of the requestor
csv                str                     The CSV representation of the sector outputs
sector_list        List[SectorOutput]      The list of sector outputs

PredictionJob.title: PredictionJob
PredictionJob.description:
Represents the details of a submitted prediction job
This model is used to return information about a prediction job that has been submitted
for processing. It contains the operator who submitted the job and the unique identifier
for the prediction request.


Attribute          Type                    Description
operator           str                     The operator who submitted the prediction job
request_id         str                     The unique identifier for the prediction request
message            str                     A message indicating the status of the submission

PredictionProgress.title: PredictionProgress
PredictionProgress.description:
Represents the progress of a prediction for a specific type of device or group of devices


Attribute          Type                    Description
number_submitted   int                     The total number of predictions submitted
number_processed   int                     The number of predictions processed so far
percent_complete   float                   The percentage of completion of the prediction process
est_time_overall   float                   The estimated overall time for completing all predictions
approx_time_left   float                   The approximate time left to complete the remaining predictions

PredictionResults.title: PredictionResults
PredictionResults.description:
Represents the prediction results with operator name, request ID, and response URL


Attribute          Type                    Description
operator           str                     The name of the operator
request_id         str                     The unique identifier for the prediction request
json_response_url  str                     The URL where the JSON prediction results can be downloaded
csv_response_url   str                     The URL where the CSV  prediction results can be downloaded

PredictionStatus.title: PredictionStatus
PredictionStatus.description:
Represents the progress of a prediction for all device types and groups of devices


Attribute          Type                    Description
prediction_state   str                     The prediction state: executing or completed
all                PredictionProgress      The prediction progress for all devices combined
rns                PredictionProgress      The prediction progress for RNs
bns                PredictionProgress      The prediction progress for BNs

heights.description: Used as first set of heights in sector/multi-sector list of heights

bn_serial.title: Bn Serial
bn_serial.description: Used in multi-sector call to force prediction using the specified BN even if not optimal

RN.title: RN
RN.description:
Represents a Remote Node (RN)
Used on input to supply information for prospective new RNs not yet installed


Attribute          Type                    Description                                                 Required
subscriber         Optional[str]           The subscriber identifier
address            Optional[str]           The address                                                 Address  OR
latitude           Optional[float]         The latitude  in degrees                                    Lat/Long IS
longitude          Optional[float]         The longitude in degrees                                    Required   
heights            Optional[Height]        The height above structure or ground level in meters
bn_serial          Optional[str]           The serial number of BN to be used even if non-optimal

RNOutput.title: RNOutput
RNOutput.description:
Represents the output of a prediction for an RN


Attribute          Type                    Description
rn                 RN                      The RN
mount              Mount                   The mounting location (above open or roof, and height agl)
gps_distance       int                     The GPS distance between BN and RN in meters
bn_rn_angle        int                     The angle between the BN and RN in degrees from north
rn_azimuth         int                     The angle between the RN and BN in degrees from north
rn_tilt            float                   The RN tilt angle in degrees
fresnel_clearance  int                     The Fresnel clearance in percentage
gnp_pathloss       GNPPathLoss             The GNP path loss configuration
gnp_errors         GNPErrors               The GNP error messages
profile_url        str                     The SVG profile GCS bucket URL
aiml_output        AIMLOutput              The AI/ML model output

Sector.title: Sector
Sector.description:
Represents a single sector for pathloss prediction
Used on input to supply information for a single sector (1 BN) pathloss prediction


Attribute          Type                    Description                                                 Required
email              Optional[str]           The email address of the requestor
rn_list            List[RN]                The list of remote nodes                                    Required
rn_heights         Optional[List[Height]]  The list of heights to use for predictions
bn                 Optional[BN]            The base node (used instead of TCS lookup)

rn_csv_file.title: Rn Csv File
rn_csv_file.description:
Required RNs .csv file for prediction
Required columns: rn.address     or  rn.latitude       and  rn.longitude
Optional columns: rn.subscriber      rn.heights.above_open  rn.heights.above_roof   rn.bn_serial

height_csv_file.title: Height Csv File
height_csv_file.description:
Optional RN heights .csv file for prediction
Required columns: height.above_open  height.above_roof

bn_csv_file.title: Bn Csv File
bn_csv_file.description:
Optional additional BNs .csv file for prediction
Required columns:
bn.serial (unique id)   bn.latitude             bn.longitude            bn.height_agl
bn.azimuth              bn.downtilt             bn.carrier.0.frequency  bn.carrier.1.frequency
Optional columns:
bn.operator             bn.region               bn.market               bn.site
bn.cell                 bn.sector               bn.hostname             bn.network_profile
bn.carrier.0.bandwidth  bn.carrier.0.tx_power   bn.carrier.2.frequency  bn.carrier.2.bandwidth  bn.carrier.2.tx_power
bn.carrier.1.bandwidth  bn.carrier.1.tx_power   bn.carrier.3.frequency  bn.carrier.3.bandwidth  bn.carrier.3.tx_power

rn_csv_file.title: Rn Csv File
rn_csv_file.description:
Required RNs .csv file for prediction
Required columns: rn.address     or  rn.latitude       and  rn.longitude
Optional columns: rn.subscriber      rn.heights.above_open  rn.heights.above_roof   rn.bn_serial

height_csv_file.title: Height Csv File
height_csv_file.description:
Optional RN heights .csv file for prediction
Required columns: height.above_open  height.above_roof

bn_csv_file.title: Bn Csv File
bn_csv_file.description:
Optional additional BNs .csv file for prediction
Required columns:
bn.serial (unique id)   bn.latitude             bn.longitude            bn.height_agl
bn.azimuth              bn.downtilt             bn.carrier.0.frequency  bn.carrier.1.frequency
Optional columns:
bn.operator             bn.region               bn.market               bn.site
bn.cell                 bn.sector               bn.hostname             bn.network_profile
bn.carrier.0.bandwidth  bn.carrier.0.tx_power   bn.carrier.2.frequency  bn.carrier.2.bandwidth  bn.carrier.2.tx_power
bn.carrier.1.bandwidth  bn.carrier.1.tx_power   bn.carrier.3.frequency  bn.carrier.3.bandwidth  bn.carrier.3.tx_power

SectorOutput.title: SectorOutput
SectorOutput.description:
Represents the output of a single sector pathloss prediction


Attribute          Type                    Description
operator           str                     The operator name
email              str                     The email address of the requestor
csv                str                     The CSV representation of the sector output
bn                 BN                      The base node
rn_list            List[RNOutput]          The list of remote node outputs
